text: The 2007–08 Montreal Canadiens season is their 98th season of play and 90th in the National Hockey League (NHL). == Regular season == == Playoffs == The Canadiens beat the Boston Bruins in the Conference Quarter-Finals 4 games to 3, and lost to the Philadelphia Flyers in the Conference Semi-Finals 1 game to 4. ==References== Category:2007 in ice hockey Category:2008 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League team seasons Category:2007 in Canada Category:2008 in Canada
title: 2007–08 Montreal Canadiens season
